TopicTitle: Community Kerbal Project: Mission #10! [Lot's of videos, lot's more to come!]

Articles.Content:
BECAUSE OF THE FORUM ARCHIVING IT\'LL TAKE SOME TIME FOR ME TO MAKE THE POST NICE AND SHINY AGAIN.

We\'re back.

This is the community Kerbal Project.

Basicly what I do is I take down the names that members request and then apply those names to kerbals and launch missions.

Please, don\'t just request your user name.

You may request a feasible mission, it may not happen, but then again it may happen. If it does, you\'re on the mission.

The Crew:

Munwig Kerman (Dead; Drag Queen)[Cave Johnson]

Great, another mission!

Just to note, my name isn\'t on the list anymore, please may you re-add it? Thanks!
Aye the list is out of date, added you all to the list and updated the crew roster with the latest stupidity induced casualties...

Aye the list is out of date, added you all to the list and updated the crew roster with the latest stupidity induced casualties...

I think you may have missed adding me to the list a while back...

Yay, J beebs mashed his ugly face into the Mun in a horribly built hunk of metal (no offense) where he probably didn\'t die on impact, but was rather stabbed to death while drowning from the blood pouring into his lungs, along with the lack of oxygen, after kissing the mun at 1,358.7151 mph. Thank you, my life is complete.

Awesome mission videos!

U have some names for crew

Into space with an epic mission!

I think you may have missed adding me to the list a while back...

Yeah I noticed, just before the forum reboot.

I\'ll add you as 'Semi Ninja' so I don\'t mispronounce it, heh...
